metadata.Title: CVE-2019-25025 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: The activerecord-session_store (aka Active Record Session Store) componentthrough 1.1.3 for Ruby on Rails does not use a constant-time approach whendelivering information about whether a guessed session ID is valid.Consequently, remote attackers can leverage timing discrepancies to achievea correct guess in a relatively short amount of time. This is a relatedissue to CVE-2019-16782.

criterions.comment: ruby-activerecord-session-store: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
